House of Commons, LOUDOil.Lear Sir,I am instructed to forward to you copies of resolutions passed at our Council Meeting rn October 8th. Resolution:'""That this Council, representing Liverpool TRADE UNIONISTS demands(a) ' Tho immediate withdrawal of our troops from Russia.(b) The stoppage of supplies to KoltohaJc : and Lenikin.(a) The raising of the blockade of Russia, (d) , The establishment of diplomatic rela-ticns between Russia and this Country.X X XX XXXYours - faithfully, (Signed) CHAS.
